main event: A civilian reported observing a basketball-sized object in Modesto, California on 25 March 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately two hours,The object was described as the size of a basketball held at arm's length,There are considerations of the Modesto airport and local searchlight practices as possible explanations for the sighting,The report concludes the sighting could be due to several natural phenomena or possibly a hoax,No photographs are available in the report.
